text: The Blue Swords began as a senior international figure skating competition in East Germany. First time in 1984 the competition was organised only for junior skaters. The 1985 edition was held November 21–23 in East-Berlin. Medals were awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles and pair skating. ==Men== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Rank ! Name !
